attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be one point of reference from beginning to end that helps lone parents to become someone in life…

I’m a lone parent with four children. I have been unemployed most of my life due to early marriage and having a family.  However, I’ve tried to regain some control in my life for myself and my children by re-entering education after about 18 years.  

It definitely wasn’t easily, a matter of fact it was very difficult and rewarding at the same time; as I’d achieved a lot in the past six years than I had over 30 years or so.  

At the moment, I’ve published my first book, for which I’m trying to gain publicity and awareness so far help I’ve gained has been inadequate and insufficient by most individuals.  

It seems nothing can be done unless you have MONEY or FANTASTIC contacts…….

I’m trying to make a difference for my children and me but it’s just not happening perhaps I should do more than I’m already doing…..

Who else feels like this…..? Is it just me!!!!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Please enter an action for HM Government in the main sentence, not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
